list_definition.definition: (in fairy stories etc) a huge person

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Jack met a giant when he climbed the beanstalk.

list_definition.definition: a person of unusually great height and size

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Stan was a giant of a man.

list_definition.definition: a person of very great ability or importance

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Einstein is one of the giants of twentieth-century science.

list_definition.definition: of unusually great height or size
